lines.gurmukhi: jYsy krpUr lon eyk sy idKweI dyq; kysr ksuMB smsr ArunweI kY [

Unknown.translation: Just as a camphor and salt being white look alike, petals of saffron and safflower (Carthamus tinctorious) being red, look the same.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijvyˆ kpUr qy lUx ictweI ivc ieko ijhy idKweI idMdy hn, kysr qy ksuMBy dIAwˆ qurIAwˆ lwlI kr ky ieko ijhIAwˆ id`sdIAwˆ hn[

lines.gurmukhi: rUpo kwNsI dono jYsy aUjl brn hoq; kwjr AO coAw hY smwn sÎwmqweI kY [

Unknown.translation: Just as silver and bronze shine alike, collyrium and incense stick ash mixed with oil have the same blackness.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijvyˆ cwˆdI qy kwˆsI dovyˆ ic`ty rMg dy huMdy hn, k`jl qy coAw rMg dI kwloˆ kr ky ieko ijhy huMdy hn[

lines.gurmukhi: ieMdRwien Pl AMimRq Pl pIq sm; hIrw AO Ptk sm rUp hY idKweI kY [

Unknown.translation: Just as colocynth (Tuma) and mango both being yellow look alike, a diamond and a marble bear the same hue.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: quMmw Pl qy AMb Pl pIly hox ivc ieko ijhy huMdy hn, hIrw qy blOr dyKx ivc ieko ijhy ic`ty hI idKweI idMdy hn[

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy Kl idRsit mYN AswD swD sm dyh; bUJq ibbykI jl jugiq smweI kY [597[

Unknown.translation: Similarly, in the eyes of a foolish person, good and bad men are seen the same, but one who is a knowledgeable person with Guru's teachings, knows how to separate milk from water like a swan. He has the ability to distinguish between a saint and a sinner.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: iqvyˆ mUrK dI nzr ivc swDU qy AswDU srIr kr ky ieko ijhy idKweI idMdy hn pr ibbykI purS smJdy hn hMswˆ vwlI jl dI jugq qy sihn SIlqw qoˆ ]597]
